# mphnd

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of mphnd is to provide an open source `R` package for the diagnosis of unilateral Neglect.

## Installation

You can install the released version of mphnd from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("mphnd")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
#library(mphnd)
## basic example code
```
